Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("A security Demand for SerializationFormatter should protect this method.")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("The method is not protected correctly against a serialization attack.")

Docs.summary: This rule checks for types that implements System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable to see if the GetObjectData method is protected with a Demand or LinkDemand for SerializationFormatter.
Docs.remarks: Before Gendarme 2.2 this rule was part of Gendarme.Rules.Security.
